languages.text: "С этого дня и до самой смерти они будут служить Неумирающему".
"From this day forth, these people serve the Undying One."
languages.original_text: "С этого дня и до самой смерти они будут служить Неумирающему".

traits.locale_text: "From this day forth these people shall serve the Undying One."
"From this day forth these people shall serve the Undying One."
"From this day forth these people shall serve the Undying One."
"From this day forth these people shall serve the Undying One."
"From this day forth, these people serve the Undying One."
"From this day forth, these people serve the Undying One."

languages.text: "Von diesem Tage an dienen diese Leute dem Todlosen."
languages.original_text: "From this day forth, these people serve the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: "Von diesem Tage an dienen diese Leute dem Todlosen."

languages.text: « À compter de ce jour, ces gens serviront l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: "From this day forth, these people serve the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: « À compter de ce jour, ces gens serviront l'Immortel. »

languages.text: «De ahora en adelante, esta gente servirá al Inmortal».
languages.original_text: "From this day forth, these people serve the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: «De ahora en adelante, esta gente servirá al Inmortal».

languages.text: 「この日より先、この者たちは不死の者に仕える」
languages.original_text: "From this day forth, these people serve the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: 「この日より先、この者たちは不死の者に仕える」

languages.text: “从今天开始，这些人将侍奉不死之神。”
languages.original_text: "From this day forth, these people serve the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: “从今天开始，这些人将侍奉不死之神。”

languages.text: "Bu insanlar bugünden itibaren Ölmeyen'e hizmet edecek."
languages.original_text: "From this day forth, these people serve the Undying One."
